name: Namco classics volume 2
summary: Namco Classic Collection Volume 2 (ナムコクラシックコレクション Namuko Kurashikku Korekushon Tsū) is a compilation arcade game that was released by Namco in 1996. It is a collection of three popular Namco games - Pac-Man (1980), Rally-X (1980) and Dig Dug (1982). In addition to the original games, there are "Arrangement" versions that include 2-player simultaneous play, additional enemies, updated graphics and music. Rally-X Arrangement did have 1-player only, unlike all other "Arrangements". In addition the game New Rally-X (1981) is selectable as well. Pac-Man Arrangement is the most notable of the "Arrangement" games.
